references: Downtown's first and only public dog park

justifications: Since announcing plans for Downtown's first dog park at this underutilized space, excitement for the project has continued to grow.
Businesses of all sizes, philanthropic partners and thousands of residents have pledged their support for this vital amenity.

references: Downtown's first and only public dog park

justifications: We are thrilled to be the title sponsor of the Downtown Milwaukee Dog Park.
As a family-owned business committed to the well-being of pets, we believe this new amenity will enhance the quality of life for both dogs and their owners in the community.

source.entity: Milwaukee Downtown, BID #21 and Historic Third Ward BID #2

references: enhance connectivity between the two neighborhoods

justifications: The Downtown Milwaukee Dog Park is the crown jewel in a series of projects that Milwaukee Downtown, BID #21 and the Historic Third Ward BID #2 have successfully undertaken to enhance connectivity between the two neighborhoods.
The development of the dog park was instrumental in attracting Fromm to the adjacent parcel, where they are now developing the 28,000-square-foot Foxtown Landing brewery, distillery and restaurant.
We are delighted to be part of the upward momentum taking place in the greater Downtown area.
